Sentencas: A solid oxide cell (SOC) integrating solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) usually utilizes two different materials as the anode and cathode prepared by the costly multi-elements co-doping process.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In this work, LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-delta (LCN) is employed as the contact material and the electrode for the symmetrical SOC and exhibits good catalytic activities towards the four typical reactions, i.e., oxygen reduction reaction (ORR), hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR), oxygen evolution reaction (OER), and CO2 reduction reaction (CO2RR).
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The LCN-GDC electrode has the low activation energies of 1.18 and 0.55 eV as the cathode and anode of SOFC, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: High peak power densities (PPDs) of 1.896 and 0.562 W cm(-2) are obtained at 800 degrees C for the Ni-YSZ (8 mol.% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2) anode-supported and YSZ (200 mu m)-supported symmetrical SOFCs, respectively.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: An electrolysis current density (ECD) of 2.316 A cm(-2) is obtained at 800 degrees C and 2.0 V and a robust operation for over 120 h with a degradation rate of about 0.5 mV h(-1) is achieved with LCN as the current collector in air side at 750 degrees C for the symmetrical SOECs.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Such a multi-functional material shows attractive competitiveness and successfully achieves fivefold applications in SOCs.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The protocol described herein affords a new vision towards material development basing on the consideration of enhancing the chemical compatibility and lowering the cost of the whole SOC but not just one electrode.
Titulo: Multi-functionalities enabled fivefold applications of LaCo0.6Ni0.4O3-δ in intermediate temperature symmetrical solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cells
